ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] "Twisting" - OOC
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, Maybe the reviewer plays a Bard in EQ :) Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Brewer of Societus Argenti Amerginn - Test server
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, Maybe the reviewer plays a Bard in EQ :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
> MULTIPLE SHAMELESS PLUG ALERT!
>
> I have to have a chuckle.. I AM the proponent of the term "riffing"
>and speaking against using the term "twisting"
>
> The tenor sax player (Kevin Kizer) from my (The Vanguard Aces
>http://www.vanguardaces.com)) also plays in another group (Ted Sirota's
>Rebel Souls) - they got "Critic's Choice" from the Chicago Reader reviewing
>their latest CD
>http://www.cdnow.com/cgi-bin/mserver/SID=1220944738/pagename=/RP/CDN/FIND/album.html/ArtistID=SIROTA*TED/DDCN=MSI-M45445
>
>The critic said that Kevin has a "tart twisty sound"... Made me think of
>this debate..
>
>Slyde of Xegony
>Aka "Fuzzbone" http://www.fuzzbone.com
